nodes.text: The Praya system was a star system located in the Clacis sector of the galaxy's Outer Rim Territories that contained the planet Praya. By the year 4.3 ABY, the Star Tours travel agency facilitated transit to this system through their Deluxe Undersea Package.
The Praya system was established in The Essential Atlas Online Companion, which placed the system in grid square K-4.
